page.title: 04CAPEL_LE_FERNE A SHORT GUIDE
page.content: Capel is on the A20 above the "White Cliffs of Dover",between Dover and Folkestone. Before the A20 was built the main road was the Old Dover Road which goes along the edge of the cliff.There is a garage and a small cliff top cafe on this road.Back on the main road there is a general store, the local police house and a large garage. Capel Street is the main village street. On it is another general store and next door a hairdresser's. Further along is the butcher's and the Post Office.Just past this is the local school. On Lancaster Avenue there is the Village Hall and the recreation ground,with swings ,a slide and a climbing frame. Capel has no doctor, dentist or public house.
